job_description:
Role: iOS Senior Developer

Location: Remote (Anywhere from Canada and Must support Pacific hours)

Duration: 6-12+ Months

Job Description

We are looking for an experienced iOS developer to join our team as an iOS Lead, with a focus on Swift UI. As an iOS Lead, you will be responsible for leading a team of iOS developers and delivering high-quality mobile applications for our clients.

Responsibilities

Lead the development of iOS native mobile applications, with a focus on Swift UI

Collaborate with cross-functional teams including product managers, designers, and backend developers to deliver high-quality software products

Working on enhancing the team's technical capabilities to overcome any technical challenges and avoid them in the first place, if possible.

Mentor and guide team members, providing feedback and guidance.

Manage the technical design and architecture of iOS applications, ensuring they are scalable, maintainable, and meet the business requirements

Stay up-to-date with the latest developments in iOS and Swift UI, and apply this knowledge to improve our development processes and practices

Participate in code reviews to ensure the codebase is of high quality, maintainable, and scalable

Requirements

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field

At least 8 years of experience developing iOS applications
